1.2.name: wordpress/posts-per-month
1.2.description: This plugin adds a widget to the dashboard, visualizing the number of posts of recent months in a column chart. The default number of month to be displayed is 15 - this can be changed in the configurations. The column chart can maximal display until the month of your first post.
